resources.string: Your order could not be processed
"If you would like to subscribe to Mobile Hotspot/Mobile Broadband Connect, call: Consumer: (800) 256-4646, Business: (800) 899-4249."

"Your current rate plan does not include the Smartphone Mobile Hotspot service, which enables you to share your phone's data connection with other devices. Do you want to add the Smartphone Mobile Hotspot service to your rate plan? You can also add it online at https://my.t-mobile.com under Manage > Plans and Services."

To use Mobile Hotspot, you will need to subscribe to the Mobile Hotspot service

string.name: spg_dlg_linktext
string.a: Learn more and subscribe to Mobile Hotspot by visiting My Verizon.

resources.string: To enable, go to att.com/mywireless or dial 611
Account not set up for tethering
There is a temporary network problem that is preventing the enablement of the Mobile Hotspot function. Please try again later
Unable to connect to data network. You may not be subscribed to a tethering or hotspot service. Please contact your carrier.
You are not subscribed to Tethering and Hotspot service. Do you want to see subscription options?
Unable to connect to a data network, turning off Tethering or Hotspot. Your plan may not have the Tethering and Hotspot service. Do you want to see subscription options?
